body:
Comment 2: 
GNU Awk 3.1.6 was released on October 25, 2007.
If you can identify a small change to the script that
will make it work with 3.1.5, that would be worth considering,
but October 2007 seems long enough ago to be okay to depend on.
Perhaps it would help to bug the MSYS maintainers 
about their very old copy.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
